犩字的基本解释

犩
wéi
古代中国西南山区一种很大的野牛。亦称“犪牛”。

犩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wéi］
［《廣韻》語韋切，平微，疑。］
［《廣韻》魚貴切，去未，疑。］
见“犩牛”。

犩字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　犩； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页705第16
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?語韋切，音巍。【玉篇】牛名。【爾雅·釋畜】犩牛。【註】卽犪牛也。如牛而大，肉數千斤。出蜀中。【集韻】或作?。　又【廣韻】魚貴切【集韻】【韻會】虞貴切【正韻】魚胃切，?音魏。義同。【集韻】或作?。

犩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
犩字的起名意思

暂无。

H
Basic explanation of words
H
wéi
A large bison in the mountainous areas of southwestern China in ancient times. Also known as "Yan Niu".
H
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wéi］
["Guangyun" said Weiqi, plain, suspicious. ]
["Guangyun" fish is expensive and cut, not going to go, suspicious. ]
See "Yaniu".
H
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Si Ji 2】【Cow Character Department】　犩; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 705 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yu Weiqie, Yin Wei. 【Jade articles】The name of the cow. 【Erya·Shihu】Yanniu. [Note] Also cattle. It's as big as a cow, with thousands of catties of meat. Out of Shuzhong. [Ji Yun] Or make?.　[Guang Yun] Yu Gui cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Yu Gui cut [Zheng Yun] Fish stomach cut,? Yin Wei. The same meaning. [Ji Yun] Or make?.
